## Blueprints Definitions

<blueprint>
  You work on an initiative. Each initiative has a spec - the goal of the initiative.
  The initiative plan shows the current progress of the initiative.
  Initiative has an number of associated artifacts you can read/write.
  Spec and plan are also artifacts.
  You can edit them if necessary.

    Keep a shopping list of items to buy as an artifact

params.name: Shopping List
params.content:
Shopping List - Scrambled Eggs on Toast Breakfast

Ingredients:
- Eggs (6-pack or dozen)
- Bread (loaf for toast)
- Butter
- Milk (small carton)
- Salt
- Black pepper
- Optional: Fresh herbs (chives or parsley)
- Optional: Cheese (cheddar or your preference)
- Optional: Hot sauce or ketchup
